description: Woman awoke and went to kitchen for a drink of water.  She looked out her kitchen window, and saw an exceptionally bright green light, which she thought was the landing light on a local logging helicopter.  Then she noticed there was a "wavy, lavender-red thing" behind the light.  It hovered in the night sky for an hour, moving perceptibly across the sky.  One hour after she first observed the object, a smaller "dot" of light streaked up to the larger object.  A third object then became visible, and then all three faded from sight.  Very strange sighting.
